Text: I saw this on HOBO many times back in the day.It's a really funny spy film, early Tom Hanks stuff. CIA's supposed to identify a mole, but instead they randomly pick Tom Hanks, because he wears one red shoe.Really funny stuff, since the Hanks character is really an eccentric co classical composer, who doesn't drive. They spend millions of dollars trying to decode his musical compositions, but it turns out to be only music. Haha!

Thanks for this moviel 

I saw it a long time ago, and remember I had a good time!. 

Good to be able to see it again.

Be happy

robs
---------------------------------------------------
